name: I love the money
description: This is an anti-utopian arcade, where you are going to play for a madman, who is obsessed with money. Your goal is to win in the season, which consists of 10 games. The contestant to collect the most coins will win. But don't you think that this is all. The TV audience is craving for their bread and circuses, so, along with the coins, there will be a lot of traps on the playing field, as well as the weapons, which the players can use to beat money out of each other. In between the matches, you will be sent to the ward, where you will have some time to sleep and to get some food.
